hardI:
Enjoy the game with the Relax mode of Game! In this mode:

● A larger grid of tiles
● There's  more repeating tiles in each level
● Every <x> levels you play a random advent level
tut1: Combine tiles to break the ice blocks nearby.
tut3: Combine tiles to break the frozen tiles nearby.
adventFinished: All advent levels are cleared, but you can find them in Relax mode.
